title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Using CAR for Quick Investigations
description: A list of useful web and data search sites for breaking news, including Google, NHTSA's Fatal Accident Reporting, Federal Railroad Administration safety data, US Census Data Set Query, Yahoo Finance, Guidestar, and OSHA.
